code: public void process(Exchange exchange) throws Exception {     CommitFile file = exchange.getIn().getBody(CommitFile.class).     Blob response = dataService.getBlob(getRepository(), file.getSha()).     String text = response.getContent().     // base64 encoding is required, then must be explicitly requested     if (response.getEncoding().equals(Blob.ENCODING_BASE64) && encoding != null && encoding.equalsIgnoreCase(Blob.ENCODING_UTF8)) {         text = new String(Base64.decodeBase64(text)).     }     // copy the header of in message to the out message     exchange.getOut().copyFrom(exchange.getIn()).     exchange.getOut().setBody(text). }
